properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTH , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_TYPE , STATUS , BLACK_CONTENT , BLACK_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , BIRTH , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , POINT FROM (SELECT MEM_NO, SUM(POI_POINT) POINT FROM MEMBER JOIN POINT USING (MEM_NO) GROUP BY MEM_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT MEM_NO MEM_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND EMAIL = ?
SELECT MEM_NO , POI_DATE , POI_POINT , POI_CONTENT FROM POINT JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY 2 DESC
